original_text: At that time Joshua turned back and captured Hazor and put its king to the sword. (Hazor had been the head of all these kingdoms.)
korean_text: 하솔은 본래 그 모든 나라의 머리였더니 그 때에 여호수아가 돌아와서 하솔을 취하고 그 왕을 칼날로 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: and put its king to the sword
Hazor had been the head of all these kingdoms
sentences.korean_translation: 하솔은 본래 이 모든 왕국의 수도였더라
